Description

Random problem selector on Baekjoon Online Judge (https://www.acmicpc.net/) and Programmers (https://programmers.co.kr/)


Features

- Getting random problem with selected problem tier range
- Eliminating problems solved by the BOJ ID if entered

Update Log

- Added 'Programmers' problems random selecting features

V 2.0
- Added detailed tier level options
- Added 'Korean problems only' options
